name: The Way Back (ketanpatel)
description:
This project was created as part of the Experimental Games Lab project at the Bauhaus University Weimar in the Summer Semester of 2020. The aim of the project was to understand the game development process and apply it in the real world.

Credits

Gianluca Pandolfo - Project Coordinator

Parva Zahed - 2D Game Art Design

Justin Ziemba - Narrative and Sound Design

Ketan Patel - Game Logic and Programming

There are a few issues that need working and we will refine and update newer versions of the game on this page.
